Reviews.Title: Fast & inexpensive
Reviews.Author: José Vieira
Reviews.Content: Fast and economic laptop, bigger and brilliant screen, overall a good deal. The only drawback I can see is the size if you're a serious traveler.

Reviews.Title: Nice Laptop
Reviews.Author: D. Stokes
Reviews.Content: Good for Video Editing, MS Office, and Web Surfing. The only PC game I play is Rollercoaster Tycoon 3 which runs well except for when I use night mode. The battery drains too quickly sometimes. I hate the placement of usb and ethernet ports. Another issue is the size when you want to travel with it. Overall, Decent laptop

Reviews.Title: Really good laptop
Reviews.Author: Yevgeniy A. Tkachuk
Reviews.Content: A great machine - fast, decent size hard drive, great display. We had to get used to the keyboard keys - if you hit them under a certain angle (if you are further from the laptop than usual, for instance) there is a chance of accidentally bumping one off its clasps. Otherwise, a great purchase.
